map.label: Map:
map.tooltip: Select a specific map to filter statistics. Choose 'All Maps' for overall data.

blueTeam.heading: Blue Team
blueTeam.tooltip: Select up to 2 brawlers for your team to see the statistics when you have these brawlers on your team (You need to enable 'Include Blue Team' option for this to work).

redTeam.heading: Red Team
redTeam.tooltip: Select up to 3 brawlers for the opposing team. Statistics will show how brawlers perform against these opponents.

bans.heading: Bans
bans.tooltip: Select up to 6 brawlers to ban. Banned brawlers will be excluded from the statistics shown.

mainContent.viewLeaderboardTooltip: View the leaderboard to see who played the most battles and who has the highest winrates.
mainContent.toggleStatsTooltip: Toggle between viewing brawler statistics or team composition statistics based on your selections.
mainContent.blueTeamLookupTooltip: When enabled, statistics are filtered to battles where your selected blue brawlers are present. This can provide more accurate winrates, but it also severely limits the available data.

minBattles.label: Min Battles:
minBattles.tooltip: Filter statistics to only include brawlers or teams that have been in at least this many battles.

rankFilter.label: Ignore ranks below:
rankFilter.tooltip: Filter statistics to only include data from battles played at or above the selected rank.

dateFilter.label: Filter Battles Since:
dateFilter.tooltip: Filter statistics to include battles played since a specific date which often corresponds to balance changes.

playerTag.label: Player Tag:
playerTag.tooltip: Enter a player tag to view their overall statistics above Masters I. This only works when blue and red team fields are empty.

status.fetchError: Failed to fetch data. Check console.
status.leaderboardFetchError: Failed to fetch leaderboard. Check console.

mainContent.noTeamStatistics: No team statistics available for the current filters.
mainContent.noBrawlerStatistics: No brawler statistics available for the current filters{{battleFilter}}{{banFilter}}.

leaderboardModal.title: Player Leaderboards

rankFilter.label: Rank:
rankFilter.tooltip: Only include battles at this rank and above.

dateFilter.label: Since:
dateFilter.tooltip: Show battles on or after this date. Data before April 30, 2025 is not available.

minBattlesFilter.label: Min Battles:
minBattlesFilter.tooltip: Minimum battles for a player to appear in the Highest Winrate list.

leaderboardModal.noData: No data available for the selected filters.
leaderboardModal.noDataOrMinBattlesNotMet: No data available for the selected filters (or minimum battles not met).
